fields.label: Enter the IP Address of your Nanoleaf Aurora. To generate an API Token, you must first press and hold the power button on the Aurora for about 5-7 seconds, until the white LED flashes briefly. Next Ask Mycroft.AI to retrieve the NanoLeaf Token.

fields.label: Ip Address of the NanoLeaf Aurora
